rows.label: qev026001_MSG0001
rows.name:
Er, hello. Welcome to the universally renowned
Candid & Credible House of Fine Wares, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026001_MSG0002
rows.name:
I've been pondering how we can better serve our
human clientele, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026001_MSG0003
rows.name:
Director General Chausson suggested the quickest route
to an amiable integration of our peoples was through
a mutually-beneficial business, didn't he?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026001_MSG0004
rows.name:
So I've decided to to to share the technology we
Ma-non pride ourselves on with everyone, yes?
And to share it at an honest price, perhaps?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026001_MSG0005
rows.name:
Come to us for all your needs, from paper napkins to
interstellar generation ships, all right? Everything is in
stock here at Candid & Credible![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026001_MSG0006
rows.name:
...Or at least, that's what I was HOPING to offer
clients, yes? Because it just sounds insanely profitable,
doesn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026001_MSG0007
rows.name:
But this running a business stuff is hard, right?
It's just been one obstacle after the next.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026001_MSG0008
rows.name:
But now that you've come along, I think my luck might
be turning around, yes? ...Er, so, may I ask a favor?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026001_MSG0009
rows.name:
First, I'd like you to take a look at something on our
ship, okay? It won't take much of your time,
and I promise it will maybe be worth the trouble.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026001_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026001_SEL0011
rows.name: Nod and accept Tutura's request.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026001_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026001_SEL0021
rows.name: Blow him off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026001_MSG0010
rows.name:
Then we have a deal, yes? Many many thanks!
I can tell that you'll be an excellent customer,
won't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026001_MSG0011
rows.name:
And I promise to treat you with respect and integrity,
so come spend all your money at Candid & Credible
House of Fine Wares, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026001_MSG0012
rows.name: Aw, have a heart, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026001_MSG0013
rows.name:
I respect that you're busy, but this is a very very
profitable offer. Strictly business, yes? No malarkey?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026001_MSG0014
rows.name:
If things go well, we could be looking at an exclusive
contract, even? I'm turning Candid & Credible into an
industry powerhouse, so so get in on the ground floor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026001_MSG0015
rows.name:
Now that that's resolved, I must be on my way, okay?
I'll explain things in more detail when next we speak,
all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026001_MSG0016
rows.name:
Oh! And over there, you'll see the super amazing
warp device Candid & Credible installed, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026001_MSG0017
rows.name:
It takes you directly to the Ma-non ship!
So fast, no? Speedy? Convenient?
Anyway, I'll be waiting for you there, okay?[ST:wait ]
